title: Strange 'copy package'
description: When attempting to copy a package, the 'copy package' feature in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3 behaves unexpectedly. After selecting xxx as the destination package, the package 'ui' is unexpectedly copied to xx.
OB: After using the 'copy package' feature, the package 'ui' is mistakenly copied to the destination package xx.
SR:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3.
2. Select the package that you want to copy.
3. Use the 'copy package' feature.
4. Select xxx as the destination package.
5. Observe that the package 'ui' is mistakenly copied to xx.
